description: Hailing from Verona, NJ, Lambda Chi is one of the big things that keeps me coming back to Tech. I am a huge world soccer fan, and could talk about that, and any other sport (except the NBA,) all day. I love music, as I listen to almost everything. This fraternity is one of my biggest passions, and I love to see it succeed.
aspects: Formal & Semi-formal, any type of Broâ€“Trip, Diversity and the friendly, natural atmosphere, Our proud history, Our pride in Lambda Chi, and our school spirit, Chef Jon's Hot Fire Cooking, Alumni involvement
name: Phil Vetrano
